member.name: T:Aurigma.GraphicsMill.AjaxControls.CanvasViewer
member.summary: This class represents a scrollable viewport web control for vector objects.

remarks.para: This class is intended to display multi-layered vector images. It allows zooming and scrolling the displayed image and supports undo and redo of actions.
